chapter.title: Platform's runtime installation
chapter.para: The Platypus Platform runtime is provided by the following ways:

listitem.para: Over the Internet as a ZIP archive file

chapter.para: If the Platypus Platform runtime is delivered as a ZIP file, unpack its contents to a location according to your preference on your hard drive.

note.para: Instructions for installing the Platypus Application Designer developer tool are available in the Developer Guide.

section.title: System requirements
section.para:
Below you can see prerequisites for launching the platform components on your computer:
32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor running at 1 gigahertz (GHz) or higher
1 gigabyte (GB) (for 32-bit system) or 2 GB (for 64-bit system) RAM
5 gigabytes (GB) of free hard disk space
Windows, Linux, Mac OS X or other operating system like Unix
Oracle JRE 7 or OpenJDK 7
Graphical user interface for client operation
Internet access for downloading updates and working with external mapping service (In a corporate network, Internet access may be arranged through a proxy server.)
Google Chrome 19, Mozilla Firefox 10, Internet Explorer 9 or newer versions of browsers for Platypus client HTML5 operation

Usually, a database server is required for operation of Platypus applications. This database server may be installed on the same computer as the client or application server, or on another computer which is accessible over the network.

note.para: The Platypus Platform is supplied with the H2 database. This database is supplied "out of the box", so it can be used immediately after installing the platform and does not require any additional installation and configuration steps.

section.title: Runtime components installation
section.para:
To install the platform components, perform the following actions:
Go to the install subdirectory of the Platypus distribution kit.
Run install.bat files for the Windows OS or perform the sh install.sh command for Linux.
Select the language of the installation program user interface.
Select the installation directory.
Select components to be installed.
Platypus Platform — the Platypus Platform's core components
Java SE client
Modules for working with maps
Application Server — includes modules required for operation of the standalone application server and server components in the J2EE servlet containers and on the application servers
Platypus Communications — modules required for operation with COM/DCOM and OPC servers.
Select settings of shortcuts for running the Platypus client in your system environment.
Platform core components are required when installing any configuration.

section.title: Uninstalling recomendations
section.para:
To delete the Platypus Platform components from your computer, perform the following actions:
Run the UninstallPlatypus program from the installed programs menu or using the corresponding shortcut. For Windows, use the conventional mechanism for removing programs.
Confirm uninstalling of Platypus components; if necessary, enable an option for removing the working directory.
